item.title: Fiction: Upon the Mere
item.description: This is a fiction that was written as my assignment of the Comprehensive English during my freshman in CQUPT. The bold fonts here are used to mark the new words of this semester as my teacher requested. Upon the Mere It’s a long dream, I’ve had, for the whole night, at the cramped cabin, in a village, my old home, from dusk to dawn. It’s a quiet place, reeds growing around it and a river soaked the nearby earth.
